svcnvplus 0.0.10

Reference

All functions

IQM()

Obtains inter quantile average for a defined 'x' vector and both lower and upper quantiles

IQSD()

Obtains inter quantile standard deviation for a defined 'x' vector and both lower and upper quantiles

ave.segmean()

Obtain the average weighted segment mean from a segmentaton file

break.density()

Identify CNV breakpoints provided a segmentation file

chr.arm.cnv()

Obtain a matrix with the weighted average CN per chromosome arm

chromosome.limit.coords()

This function mapps defines mapping limmit regions based on a segmentation file

circ.chromo.plot()

Circos plot combining segmentation and SV calls

circ.wg.plot()

Circos plot combining segmentation and SV calls

clean.cnv.artifact()

Obtain a matrix with the weighted average CN per chromosome arm

cnv.freq.plot()

Plot CNV frequency across the human genome from a seg file sontaining multiple samples

cnv.gene.breaks()

Identify recurrently altered genes

createRandomString()

Obtains inter quantile standard deviation for a defined 'x' vector and both lower and upper quantiles

freq.p.test()

Obtains significance cutoff for the frequency of binary events encoded in a matrix

gene.cnv()

Obtain a matrix with the weighted average CN per chromosome arm

match.breaks()

Identify CNV breakpoints provided a segmentation file

match.variant.breaks()

Identify CNV breakpoints provided a segmentation file

med.segmean()

Obtain the median segment mean from a segmentaton file

merge2lists()

Given two lists with (or without common names) returns a combined list; if common names their values are returned unique

pct.genome.changed()

Calculate the percentage of genome changed by CNV

recurrent.regions.plot()

Plot CNV frequency across the human genome from a seg file sontaining multiple samples

seg.breaks()

Identify read-depth breakpoints provided a segmentation file

segdat_lung_ccle

CCLE degmentation data from breast tissue cell lines

segment.gap()

Filling gaps in a segmentation dat abased on chromosome limits defined withing the complete segmentation dataset

shattered.eval()

Evaluate shattered regions

shattered.regions()

Caller for shattered genomic regions based on breakpoint densities

shattered.regions.cnv()

Caller for shattered genomic regions based on breakpoint densities

sv.breaks()

Identify SV call breakpoints and filter low cov regions if provided

validate.seg()

This function calculates the percent genome changed by CNV

validate.sv()

This function calculates the percent genome changed by CNV sv classes accepted: DEL(deletion), DUP(duplication), h2hINV(head to head inversion), t2tINV(tail to tail inversion), TRA(translocation), INV(inversion)
